author: Chris Jen
comment: Bought the paid version. Doesn't work with my Foxtel IQ3 box. Doesn't work with my Optus Fetch Mighty. Sort of works with my Sony BDV but functionally vastly inferior to actual remote.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content:
Unfortunately the IQ3 box doesn't have IP control on it, the next update to MyAV will have IR codes for it, but you will need a 3rd party IR blaster as the S8+ doesn't have one built in.
We are looking to add support for the Fetch TV Mini/Mighty in the not too distant future.

author: LumberJackCole Briggs
comment: Says it's free after a week it says my free trial is over and I have to purchase the app for 8.99 to continue to use it . I'm ordering a new remote off eBay because my actual remote broke.

author: FELIX CABALLERO
comment: This app is pure garbage didn't even work apps like this should be banned from Google play store

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content:
Which make and model of device were you trying to control? Did you check the compatibility on our website?
If MyAV failed to find your equipment on your network then it's normally down to your setup.

author: Richard Latimer
comment: Absolutely brilliant. Can only imagine that those who give it a poor rating are the same kind of geniuses that think crayons are hors d'œuvres. Set up different profiles for different rooms. My whole house can now be controlled from my phone. The only way it could be better if it had an xbox one remote too, but hey ho can't win them all. Only gripe is volume has just suddenly stopped working. Don't know if due to a recent update as I have auto updates. Going to uninstall and see if that fixes. Also nit picking. Make your menus look a bit prettier. It looks unfinished.

author: PIZZAGamerYT G
comment: Finally an app that works with the Samsung s8 as remote. i país 8$ and now I have to pay 1$ monthly????

author: Angela Mafaldo
comment: I need to remove and get my money back Its almost 5 months plus 8.99 the subscription

author: sean mcghee
comment: It just freezes up

author: daniel jephthah
comment: Better use Peel. No need fancy settings.

author: Judith Armstrong
comment: To hard to make it work.

author: Suha Sulaiman
comment: Not work at all

author: lady luck
comment: Peel remote is better ppl

author: Jersey Winger
comment: It works perfectly

author: Pauline Nixon
comment: Rubbish

author: Raymond Jackson
comment: Awesome

I was very happy to find this app and had no problems with it during the free trial. It was compatible with my Blu-ray player and worked wonderfully! I was so happy that I went ahead and purchased the app after the trial period ended. However, after purchasing the app, it is not working at all. I haven't changed anything and it continues to say there are "no devices found" and there is a problem with my router. I am having no trouble whatsoever connecting my phone and my laptop to my internet and even after rebooting my router several times, I have not been able to successfully use this app. Needless to say, I am very disappointed and would like to request a refund for purchasing the full version that is clearly not the same as the trial version.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please make sure that your Blu-Ray player is turned on and connected to your network or contact us info@myav.co.uk

author: Traci R
comment: $8.50? Great "FREE" app. Works really well... UNTIL THE TRIAL EXPIRES AND THEY WANT $8.50!  I can buy a replacement remote for that price. Got to use it once, before it demands payment. Worthless. Uninstalled and noted the developers so i don't support them in future apps. GET A CLUE GUYS. Charge me a buck, or two, I'd have paid. $8.50 is WAY too much.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: MyAV doesn't just control Sony, it can control 1000's of devices. It's much cheaper than any other similar universal remote app.

author: Latoya Ortiz
comment: Love this app..downloaded after numerous attempts of trying to use other apps and them not working...worked perfect for our smart tv and blu ray DVD player...worked so well I purchased app after the free trial ended couldn't be happier

author: Daniel Johnson
comment: Yes you have to pay for it after the free trial is over but that is what the free trial is for.  So that you know you aren't buying a broken product.  All the free universal remote apps don't work with my blu-ray player that has a broken play button but this does.

author: Jeffrey Duerr
comment: I wanted to use this to operate my Blu-ray. But the only thing it wanted to do is run my DirecTV. I don't need it for that.

author: Jason Starvetsky
comment: An addendum, uninstalled your malware and  my HD tv still VERY grainy. If I can't fix it I'll be sending the repair bill to you!

author: Maia Omar
comment: I loved it!  Used it for my blu ray and tv. I bought the app and all was well, until a month later it wont work until I pay AGAIN!!! Please fix it!

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please can you email us info@myav.co.uk

author: Daniel Galvez
comment: Trash Just trash tried connecting it with my blue ray player , but right after opening it it connected to my tv

author: Rebecca Wisdom
comment: 1st time I downloaded it pops up that 7day trial expired and wants me to pay 8.99 month to use. Even if it worked..Why would anyone???

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please try uninstalling and reinstalling. You should now be able to try MyAV again for 7 days.

author: Maria Ev
comment: Worked fairly well for my Sony blu ray but I didn't realize it was just a 7 day trial then it would cost 9.99. I can buy a full universal remote that will also control my tv for that price!
Doesn't work with my blue ray.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Which model number do you have?

comment: Worked great until I paid for it! Sony blueray!

reply.content: Please can you email us info@myav.co.uk

comment: Not free

author: Hani Mador
comment: Simple and ad free (or at least I have not seen ads on this app)..  Again it is AD F*ing free.. it works with Sony KDL40EX520..   the only big thing that does not work is the on/off button..

author: kev richards
comment: The seven day free trial was expired as soon as I installed the app ..junk

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: You must have downloaded one of our apps in the past as we log the user ID and serial number of your device. We've reset your trial period if you would like to try MyAV again. It works great on the Pixel C (this is one of the devices we test with).

author: Sandra Faircloth
comment: I couldn't figure it out and if i have to work this hard to figure it out it isn't worth it.

author: Talia Yazzie
comment: Hard to figure out and confusing

author: owen watkins
comment: Is there a way to type through the app or not?

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Depends on the device you are controlling and the TV app you are using. Most Smart TV's and Blu-Ray players don't pass through their keyboard commands to the app you are running on them. So it makes the keyboard useless for searching on Netflix for example and only useful in the menus of the TV or BD player

comment: Wouldn't control sony blu ray

comment: Works really well and worked automatically

comment: Can you pls NOT make us pay when the trial is over plzzzzzz 😁i will luv it if u didint make us pay 😢😢😁

author: Steve Roth
comment: Works with my Samsung smart TV, Sony UBP-800 and Roku. Would have given 5 stars, but interface could be more attractive and all occasionally bugs.
It just kept shutting down every time I wanted to add my tv to this app.

author: Rabbit Wolf
comment: It doesn't do half the things it says it does a total waste of time need a lot of improvement. The YouTube video was long winded and again promotes stuff this app does not do..

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Sorry that you feel this way. Which devices were you trying to control? Which things doesn't it do?

author: Alberto C. Renteria
comment: Was good during the trail period after that I pay 10 dollars for it and magically stopped working. I want my money back!!! I'm not losing my time emailing no-one to get support .
